title: Lethal Primary, QUIBI IS HERE 4.8.20
itunes:title: Lethal Primary, QUIBI IS HERE 4.8.20
description:
In episode 604, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Teresa Lee to discuss Forbes doxing a bunch of billionaires, the butthole cut of Cats, the Wisconsin elections, Trump's new campaign spokeswoman, who is to blame for the coronavirus blunder in the US, Quibi, Dr. Fauci merch, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. World’s Billionaire List: The Richest in 2020
  2. At Last, the True Story of the ‘Cats’ “Butthole Cut” Can Be Told – And It’s More Horrible Than We Imagined
  3. Editing the Buttholes Out of ‘Cats’ Was a Total Nightmare for VFX Crew
  4. Wisconsin Election: Voters Find Long Lines and Closed Polling Sites
  5. Trump Has a New Press Secretary: Kayleigh McEnany, a Campaign Spokeswoman
  6. Alarm, Denial, Blame: The Pro-Trump Media’s Coronavirus Distortion
  7. Trade Adviser Warned White House in January of Risks of a Pandemic
  8. Will Arnett's Quibi show 'Memory Hole' was accused of plagiarizing a 2014 YouTube channel of the same name
  9. Quibi only had 300,000 live downloads on its first day
  10. Fauci socks, Fauci doughnuts, Fauci fan art: The coronavirus expert attracts a cult following
  11. Museum to sell Fauci bobbleheads
  12. Petition to name Dr. Anthony Fauci ‘Sexiest Man Alive’ gains momentum
  13. Beat the Bomb virtual video game created to raise money for NYC Health + Hospitals
  14. WATCH: Matt Large - Dusty Conscience

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
